PLAN OF CARE

Planned Activity Plan Schedule
TAC Chemotherapy Regimen Plan Premedicate with Dexamethasone 40 mg PO/IV once daily on days 1-4 and 11-14 every 21 days starting 1 day before administration of Doxorubicin (50 mg/m2) and Cyclophosphamide (500 mg/m2) every 3 weeks. Adminster docetaxel 75 mg/m2 intravenously one hour after completion of Doxorubicin and Cyclophosphamide. Every 21 days starting 1 day for 6 cycles
